EnhancedContent:
AI functions offer a single-click way to perform tasks like text summarization, classification, translation, sentiment analysis, executing your own prompt, and more, all without writing complex code. With Data Wrangler’s interactive interface, you will be able to watch your transformations instantly with real-time previews to help you prepare data more confidently.

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/word-image-27038-1.gif)

*A GIF demonstrating how to use AI functions in Data Wrangler to instantly classify transactions on a bank statement data frame.*

## Additional AI Capabilities in Data Wrangler (Generally Available)

You can see smart suggestions based on [Microsoft PROSE](https://www.microsoft.com/research/group/prose/) for operations that are relevant to your data frame.

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/word-image-27038-2.png)

*AI-powered suggestions highlight Data Wrangler operations that are relevant to you*.

With Copilot, you can describe your desired transformations in natural language, and it will generate code and an instant preview of the results.

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/word-image-27038-3.png)

*With Copilot in Data Wrangler, you can generate custom code from your own instructions.*

For big data workflows, Data Wrangler can [Microsoft PROSE](https://www.microsoft.com/research/group/prose/), making it easy to scale your transformations across large datasets.

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/word-image-27038-4.png)

*Data Wrangler can translate all your operations from pandas to PySpark, using AI where necessary to produce the most accurate code.*

## Next steps
